content: Hi , I'm new here - I'm from Cerner Germany - working also on FHIR usage . Does anyone have the link to the cool video "We didn't startt the FHIR" that was shown at Hl7 WG meeting in Cologne recently?
Joerg, The video is the first video available at https://www.youtube.com/user/HealthLevelSevenInc (the Health Level Seven Youtube page) Also, directly: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6ag4XjjsHJA
Hi David, thanks a lot! - I had been searching by the title ...
